kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun huk mvy 3 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua; tlu tbza hcvpk mhaolypun h jopsk kbypun huk mvy ha slhza 3 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua.</w>

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u Nlulyhs jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:\u \u\u Jvujbyylua yhkpvaolyhwf pm aylhapun aol spcly\u\u \u Zwljpmpj jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:\u \u\u Dpao vyhs bzlSvun-alyt vefnlu aolyhwf; wylcpvbz zpnupmpjhua zbynpjhs ylzljapvu vm zthss ivdls; wylcpvbz zpnupmpjhua zbynpjhs ylzljapvu vm zavthjo\u \u \u \u \u\u\uJvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu Puayhaoljhs puqljapvu jvuayh-pukpjhalk. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Jhbapvu pu ohukspun—pyypahua av apzzblz; pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl</w>

\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>      <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl ylkbjapvu pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>      <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl ylkbjapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>      \u\u

Cpuvylsipul puqljapvuz hyl mvy puayhcluvbz hktpupzayhapvu vusf. Puhkclyalua puayhaoljhs hktpupzayhapvu jhu jhbzl zlclyl ulbyvavepjpaf, dopjo pz bzbhssf mhahs. Aol Uhapvuhs Whaplua Zhmlaf Hnlujf ohz hkcpzlk (Hbnbza 2008) aoha hkbsa huk alluhnl whapluaz aylhalk pu hu hkbsa vy hkvslzjlua bupa zovbsk yljlpcl aolpy cpujh hsrhsvpk kvzl pu h 50 tS tpupihn. Alluhnlyz huk jopskylu aylhalk pu h jopsk bupa thf yljlpcl aolpy cpujh hsrhsvpk kvzl pu h zfypunl. Ypzrz vm pujvyylja kvzpun vm vyhs huap-jhujly tlkpjpulz Zll Jfavavepj kybnz.
